datasets.notes: Scraped from lnb.fr/pro-a/calendrier using Playwright. Returns placeholder IDs, not fixture UUIDs.

datasets.name: Play-by-Play
datasets.notes: Fetched from Atrium Sports API. Requires fixture UUID from match-center URLs. ~629 events/game, 12 event types.

datasets.name: Shot Chart
datasets.notes: Fetched from Atrium Sports API. Requires fixture UUID. ~123 shots/game, coordinates on 0-100 scale.

datasets.name: Calendar by Division
datasets.notes: Endpoint: GET /match/getCalenderByDivision. Returns full season schedule for a division.

datasets.name: Team Comparison
datasets.test_error: Request failed for /stats/getTeamComparison: HTTPError('404 Client Error: Not Found for url: https://api-prod.lnb.fr/stats/getTeamComparison?match_external_id=28910')
datasets.notes: Endpoint: GET /stats/getTeamComparison. Pre-match team stats comparison.

datasets.name: Last 5 Home/Away
datasets.test_error: Request failed for /stats/getLastFiveMatchesHomeAway: HTTPError('404 Client Error: Not Found for url: https://api-prod.lnb.fr/stats/getLastFiveMatchesHomeAway?match_external_id=28910')
datasets.notes: Endpoint: GET /stats/getLastFiveMatchesHomeAway. Recent form for each team.

datasets.name: Match Officials
datasets.test_error: Request failed for /stats/getMatchOfficialsPreGame: HTTPError('404 Client Error: Not Found for url: https://api-prod.lnb.fr/stats/getMatchOfficialsPreGame?match_external_id=28910')

datasets.name: Competition Teams

datasets.name: Main Competitions

datasets.notes: Endpoint: GET /common/getMainCompetition. Available competitions for a year.

datasets.name: Boxscore (Player-Game Stats)
datasets.notes: Placeholder in LNB API client. Endpoint path unknown. Needs DevTools discovery.

datasets.name: Player Season Stats
datasets.notes: get_persons_leaders endpoint exists but returns leaders only, not all players.

datasets.name: Standings
datasets.notes: get_standing endpoint exists (POST /altrstats/getStanding) but needs testing.
